languages.text: Священная планета Механикус Ефрат-II под ударом! Культ Последнего восхода проник на этот мир и стремится подчинить его кузницы. Эксплораторский флот Осознание отозвал эскадры, чтобы защитить свой домен, а Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар направил на помощь свои войска.

Eufrates II, a sacred planet of the Adeptus Mechanicus, is in peril! The Cult of the Final Dawn has taken over this world and seeks to seize control of its forges. The Explorator Cognisance Fleet has recalled its ships to protect its domain, and Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has sent his own forces to assist.
languages.original_text: Священная планета Механикус Ефрат-II под ударом! Культ Последнего восхода проник на этот мир и стремится подчинить его кузницы. Эксплораторский флот Осознание отозвал эскадры, чтобы защитить свой домен, а Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар направил на помощь свои войска.

traits.locale_text: Eufrates II, a sacred planet of the Adeptus Mechanicus, is in peril! The Cult of the Final Dawn has taken over this world and seeks to seize control of its forges. The Explorator Cognisance Fleet has recalled its ships to protect its domain, and Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has sent his own forces to assist.

Eufrates II, a sacred planet of the Adeptus Mechanicus, is in peril! The Cult of the Final Dawn has taken over this world and seeks to seize control of its forges. The Explorator Cognisance Fleet has recalled its ships to protect its domain, and Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has sent his own forces to assist.

Eufrates II, a sacred planet of the Adeptus Mechanicus, is in peril! The Cult of the Final Dawn has taken over this world and seeks to seize control of its forges. The Explorator Cognisance Fleet has recalled its ships to protect its domain, and Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has sent his own forces to assist.

Eufrates II, a sacred planet of the Adeptus Mechanicus, is in peril! The Cult of the Final Dawn has taken over this world and seeks to seize control of its forges. The Explorator Cognisance Fleet has recalled its ships to protect its domain, and Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has sent his own forces to assist.

languages.text: Euphrate-II, une planète sacrée de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, est en danger ! Le Culte de l'Aube finale l'a envahie et cherche à prendre le contrôle de ses forges. La Flotte de la Connaissance des Explorators a ordonné à ses vaisseaux de protéger son domaine et le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar y a envoyé ses propres troupes à son aide.
languages.original_text: Eufrates II, a sacred planet of the Adeptus Mechanicus, is in peril! The Cult of the Final Dawn has taken over this world and seeks to seize control of its forges. The Explorator Cognisance Fleet has recalled its ships to protect its domain, and Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has sent his own forces to assist.

traits.locale_text: Euphrate-II, une planète sacrée de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, est en danger ! Le Culte de l'Aube finale l'a envahie et cherche à prendre le contrôle de ses forges. La Flotte Explorator de la Connaissance a ordonné à ses vaisseaux de protéger son domaine et le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar y a envoyé ses propres troupes à son aide.

languages.text: 机械修会的神圣行星“欧夫拉茨二号星”正处于危机之中！“终末黎明”邪教已经占领了这个世界，打算控制这个世界的所有铸造工厂。真理开拓者舰队已经召唤了战舰，准备守护他们的领地，而大审判官卡尔卡扎也调遣了自己的私人部队，前来协助战斗。
languages.original_text: Eufrates II, a sacred planet of the Adeptus Mechanicus, is in peril! The Cult of the Final Dawn has taken over this world and seeks to seize control of its forges. The Explorator Cognisance Fleet has recalled its ships to protect its domain, and Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has sent his own forces to assist.

traits.locale_text: 机械修会的神圣行星“欧夫拉茨二号星”正处于危机之中！“终末黎明”邪教已经占领了这个世界，打算控制这个世界的所有铸造工厂。真理开拓者舰队已经召唤了战舰，准备守护他们的领地，而卡尔卡扎审判长也调遣了自己的私人部队，前来协助战斗。

languages.text: 帝国技術局の聖なる惑星、ユーフラテス・IIが危機に瀕している！最後の夜明け教団がこの惑星を支配し、鍛冶場を掌握しようとしている。コグニサンス探索艦隊はその領域を守るために自分たちの船を呼び戻し、ロード・インクィジターのカルカサルは自軍を遣わし増援した。
languages.original_text: Eufrates II, a sacred planet of the Adeptus Mechanicus, is in peril! The Cult of the Final Dawn has taken over this world and seeks to seize control of its forges. The Explorator Cognisance Fleet has recalled its ships to protect its domain, and Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has sent his own forces to assist.

traits.locale_text: 帝国技術局の聖なる惑星、ユーフラテス・IIが危機に瀕している！最後の夜明け教団がこの惑星を支配し、鍛冶場を掌握しようとしている。コグニサンス探索艦隊はその領域を守るために自分たちの船を呼び戻し、ロード・インクィジターのカルカサルは自軍を遣わし増援した。

languages.text: Eufrates II, ein heiliger Planet des Adeptus Mechanicus, ist in Gefahr! Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung hat diesen Planeten übernommen und will seine Schmieden unter seine Kontrolle bringen. Die Erkenntnisflotte der Exploratoren hat ihre Schiff zurückgerufen, um ihr Reich zu beschützen, und Großinquisitor Calcazar hat seine eigenen Truppen zur Unterstützung geschickt.
languages.original_text: Eufrates II, a sacred planet of the Adeptus Mechanicus, is in peril! The Cult of the Final Dawn has taken over this world and seeks to seize control of its forges. The Explorator Cognisance Fleet has recalled its ships to protect its domain, and Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has sent his own forces to assist.

traits.locale_text: Eufrates II, ein heiliger Planet des Adeptus Mechanicus, ist in Gefahr! Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung hat diesen Planeten übernommen und will seine Schmieden unter seine Kontrolle bringen. Die Erkenntnisflotte der Exploratoren hat ihre Schiff zurückgerufen, um ihr Reich zu beschützen, und Großinquisitor Calcazar hat seine eigenen Truppen zur Unterstützung geschickt.

languages.text: ¡Eufrates II, un planeta sagrado del Adeptus Mechanicus, corre peligro! El Culto del Amanecer Final ha capturado el planeta y busca hacerse con el control de sus forjas. La Flota Exploradora Conciencia ha ordenado a sus naves que vuelvan para proteger sus dominios y el Lord Inquisidor Calcazar ha enviado fuerzas en su ayuda.
languages.original_text: Eufrates II, a sacred planet of the Adeptus Mechanicus, is in peril! The Cult of the Final Dawn has taken over this world and seeks to seize control of its forges. The Explorator Cognisance Fleet has recalled its ships to protect its domain, and Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has sent his own forces to assist.

traits.locale_text: ¡Eufrates II, un planeta sagrado del Adeptus Mechanicus, corre peligro! El Culto del Amanecer Final ha capturado el planeta y busca hacerse con el control de sus forjas. La Flota Exploradora Conciencia ha ordenado a sus naves que vuelvan para proteger sus dominios y el Lord Inquisidor Calcazar ha enviado fuerzas en su ayuda.

languages.text: Adeptus Mechanicus'un kutsal olarak gördüğü bir gezegen olan Eufrates II tehlike altında! Nihai Şafak Tarikatı, dünyanın ve metal ocaklarının kontrolünü ele geçirdi. Keşiftör Malumat Filosu, diyarını korumak adına gemilerini geri çağırdı ve Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar da destek amacıyla kendi kuvvetlerini gönderdi.
languages.original_text: Eufrates II, a sacred planet of the Adeptus Mechanicus, is in peril! The Cult of the Final Dawn has taken over this world and seeks to seize control of its forges. The Explorator Cognisance Fleet has recalled its ships to protect its domain, and Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has sent his own forces to assist.
